title: India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard
text: February 1, 2018 / 6:40 PM / in a day India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Feb 1 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 1st odi between South Africa and India on Thursday at Durban, South Africa India win by 6 wickets South Africa 1st innings Quinton de Kock lbw Yuzvendra Chahal 34 Hashim Amla lbw Jasprit Bumrah 16 Faf du Plessis c Hardik Pandya b Bhuvneshwar Kumar 120 Aiden Markram c Hardik Pandya b Yuzvendra Chahal 9 JP Duminy b Kuldeep Yadav 12 David Miller c Virat Kohli b Kuldeep Yadav 7 Chris Morris b Kuldeep Yadav 37 Andile Phehlukwayo Not Out 27 Kagiso Rabada Run Out MS Dhoni 1 Extras 0b 3lb 1nb 0pen 2w 6 Total (50.0 overs) 269-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-30 Amla, 2-83 de Kock, 3-103 Markram, 4-122 Duminy, 5-134 Miller, 6-208 Morris, 7-264 du Plessis, 8-268 Rabada Did Not Bat : Morkel, Tahir Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Bhuvneshwar Kumar 10 1 71 1 7.10 1w Jasprit Bumrah 10 0 56 1 5.60 1w Hardik Pandya 7 0 41 0 5.86 1nb Yuzvendra Chahal 10 0 45 2 4.50 Kuldeep Yadav 10 0 34 3 3.40 Kedar Jadhav 3 0 19 0 6.33 India 1st innings Rohit Sharma c Quinton de Kock b Morne Morkel 20 Shikhar Dhawan Run Out Aiden Markram 35 Virat Kohli c Kagiso Rabada b Andile Phehlukwayo 112 Ajinkya Rahane c Imran Tahir b Andile Phehlukwayo 79 Hardik Pandya Not Out 3 MS Dhoni Not Out 4 Extras 0b 6lb 0nb 0pen 11w 17 Total (45.3 overs) 270-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-33 Sharma, 2-67 Dhawan, 3-256 Rahane, 4-262 Kohli Did Not Bat : Jadhav, Kumar, Yadav, Bumrah, Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Morne Morkel 7 0 35 1 5.00 1w Kagiso Rabada 9.3 0 48 0 5.05 Chris Morris 7 0 52 0 7.43 2w Imran Tahir 10 0 51 0 5.10 Andile Phehlukwayo 8 0 42 2 5.25 2w JP Duminy 2 0 16 0 8.00 1w Aiden Markram 2 0 20 0 10.00 1w Umpire Ian Gould Umpire Bongani Jele Video Aleem Dar Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
